articles.title: Midwest Trade Expo 2023
articles.summary: While skaters shredded at the Centennial Park skatepark, Ethan shredded on his guitar, Connor shredded his drumsticks, and Clint shredded his fingers.

articles.title: Live at the Depths Backyard
articles.summary: We were prepared for the absolute worst. We didn't think we would make it half way through the set without the police shutting us down...

articles.title: Activator 9
articles.summary: Activator Magazine, a local magazine in Springfield, Illinois featured Acid Fog in their September 2023 issue #63

articles.title: Mellow: Out Now!
articles.summary: Mellow, released on September 20th 2023, is a beautiful and mellow EP full of sweet and soft songs combined with heavier elements...

articles.title: The Hellbent Studios Demos
articles.summary: The Hellbent Studio Demos have been released as a Bandcamp exclusive on July 11, 2023. The album has 6 songs, with no title track...

articles.title: Into the Fog: Out Now!
articles.summary: Released on April 20th, 2023, Into the Fog is an album containing seven tracks, the Title Track "Into The Fog" is the second track on the album...

articles.title: Original Jam: Out Now!
articles.summary: Released on April 1st 2023, Original Jam is a single containing two tracks, the Title Track "Original Jam," and "memory Rot Nostalgia..."
